data.title: Overseas TV DVD New Star Trek DVD Complete Season 5 Limited Special Premium Box
data.meta_description:
DVD 7 disc set

[Recording time]
1307 minutes

[Screen size]
Standard

[Audio information]
English (5.1) ・Japanese

[Subtitle Information]
Japanese / English

[Limited Edition]
Limited to 5000 sets for the first shipment, 7 discs

[Special Specification Contents]
Picture Disc

[Group Name]
New Star Trek DVD Complete Season Special Premium Box

[Enclosed Bonus Contents]
Exterior slip case (cylinder type) / 7 sheets Digital storage case for disc storage / Direct import special premium box (common name: Silver capsule) / Original special booklet (all color 16P) / Exterior notification sheet / Picture disc

[Video benefits]
[7] Dedicated to GENE RODDENBERRY / [7] Galaxy guest performers / [7] Words of aliens / [7] Outline of mission / [7] Production department and music department / [ 7 ] Special effects / [7] Remembering missions

[List of performers]
Performance: Patrick Stewart / Jonathan Flakes / Brent Spinner / Lever Burton / Michael Dawn / Arena Thirtis / Will・ Wheaton / Gates / McFadden / Woopy Goldberg Voice appearances: Mugi / Akio Otsuka / Yoshitada Otsuka / Mitsuaki Hoshino / Matsuaki Hoshino / Masara Takashima / Akira Ishida / Miyuki Jyo / Mikie Tojo

[ List of Contents]
[1] Klingon Empire Crisis / Part 2 Mysterious Tamarin Alien Nomadic Bayjou Alien Murderous Space Crystal [2] Enterprise Panic Alien Game Infiltrate! Romulan Empire-Part 1-Disappearance of Mr. Spock Infiltrate! Romulan Empire-Part 2-With Mr. Spock Reunion [3] 26th Century Time Traveler < Episode 10: New Warp Navigation Soliton Wave (Episode 11) Mystery of the Dark Star Cluster (Episode 12) Alien Intruder Alien Alien [4] (Episode 13) Genetically Manipulated Planet Ghost Rebel Neuromedicine Expert Dr. Russell [5] Bisexual Genie Alien Space Time Continuity of Fear Academy of Sorrow Graduation Ceremony Marriage of Laksana [6] Ultimate Partner Imaginary Friend Borg "NUMBER 3" Mystery of Transfer Accident [7 ] Super Dimensional Planet Katurn Time Slip Alien First Part \
